content:
Using Modelsim on openlab

ssh -XY your-username@openlab.ics.uci.edu
module load altera/modelsim/15.1
create (or cd to) your "work" directory where all your VHDL files should reside
vsim

vsim will start Modelsim and open a UI window on your computer. Use it to
1. Create a new project (or open an existing one)
2. Import your design files
3. Click on Compile and compile them - design before testbench
4. Click on Simulate and then Start Simulation.
5. Enable Wave in View, add variables you want to track
6. Run simulation
